publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2444.1 Dennis Canavan: The Executive's Vision for the Protection and Promotion of Scotland's Natural Heritage—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2444) in the name of Ross Finnie, insert at end "; and calls on the Executive to recognise that Scotland’s mountains, glens and lochs are not simply the property of the landed gentry but are part of our natural heritage by re-drafting the Land Reform (Scotland) Bill to ensure a genuine right of access to the countryside."
